title: The Todd Starnes Show – September 9th, 2019
text:
Here's what happened today on The Todd Starnes Show:

Todd speaks with NC State Rep. Greg Murphy about why the race in NC's 3rd District is so important for President Trump and the GOP.



Email Embed

Watch the latest video at foxnews.com

Todd speaks with Rep. Jody Hice (R-GA) about what Democrats and Republicans will focus on as Congress returns to the Hill.

Former Congressman Paul Broun called in to welcome Todd Starnes to Atlanta radio station WGST.

Todd speaks with Trump 2020 Campaign National Press Secretary Kayleigh McEnany about President Trump's rally in North Carolina.
